subject: Re: [junit] Getting started with Junit
msgSnippet: ... JUnit finds TestCalculator without any problems, but it does not find any tests in the class. Have you written any tests? Can you show us the source for
messageBody:
salem jaffer wrote:

> Under Result Window:
> Warning(junit.framework.TestSuite$1) No tests found in TestCalculator
> junit.framework.AssertionFailedError: No tests found in TestCalculator
>
> Please Note: I have TestCalculator.class available under
> c:\junitbook\jumpstart folder.
> *"This is the first time I ran a junit test".
>
> Please let me know what i am doing wrong and if there is a better way to
> resolve this
> issue.

JUnit finds TestCalculator without any problems, but it does not find
any tests in the class. Have you written any tests? Can you show us the
source for TestCalculator?
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
